TopicTitle: Do Not Taunt the Magic Boulder!

Articles.Content: if model 4 blue magic boulder starts to hum, report occurrence, provide product code, and do not taunt magic boulder
Do not get within 50 meters of the red Boulder.
Do not time warp near the Magic Boulder!!
do not exist near the magic boulder
Never not find a magic boulder.
Have no physical interaction with shiny green rock.
never be the magic boulder
Do not “come in for a chat and some tea” with the magic boulder.
do not jumpscare the magic boulder
Do not ask for stories about the magic boulder
Do do not not yes no yes yes Magic Boulder.
Do not dock with the Magic Boulder.
Do not deliver the Magic Boulder to Kerbin. Your ship and the entire planet will get eaten anyways.

Do not feed Magic Boulders after midnight! 

And never, ever, wet them!

**Edited <time datetime="2018-12-29T20:31:07Z" title="12/29/2018 08:31  PM" data-short="5 yr">December 29, 2018</time> by Lisias**
Do not visit the magic boulder in 3 AM.
Do not, my fellow Forumers,  become addicted to Magic Boulder. It will take hold of you and you will resent it’s absence.
Do not ask why the Magic Boulder is the Magic Boulder.
Do not throw the magic boulder at Jool. It will create a singularity that heats that planet up unpredictably and causing catastrophes on its moons.
Do not not make a station around The Matt-gic boulder.
Never attempt to aerobrake a magic boulder
Do not  write on magic boulder
Do not write 'Magic Boulders suck' in the same system as a magic boulder
Do not change SOIs with the Magic Boulder grabbed.
Do not make a thread about not taunting the magic boulder.
do not or i m just gonna spawn more or less at random a few hours after being summoned, needless to say the magic boulder beholders are careless with regular not-if''
